name: Void: A non-interactive art installation
description:
"Void: A non-interactive art installation" was produced for the Pentlands Digital Art Open Day 2021 with the express purpose of visualising an act of game development which features no creative input at all. The Unity game engine was used to develop a Universal Render Pipeline project, sample scene GameObjects were removed, and then the project was compiled for play. The resultant WebGL build and downloadable Win10 build are then capable of rendering Unity's interpretation of the void.

Please note that the downloadable version of "Void: A non-interactive art installation" is licensed for personal use only. You must contact the developer directly should your institution wish to exhibit this artwork.

Minimum system requirements:

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or better

HDD: 200 MB free space

RAM: 4 GB

VRAM: 2 GB
